maqras.text: A L. M
Ludia myslienka they lavy say My robit je verit put test
My tested those them GOD distinguish those bol truthful He expose liars
those commit zhresit myslienka ze they robit vzdy fool us? zlo indeed bol ich judgment
(Ktokolvek hoping schodza GOD zauzlit ze) such schodza GOD will vela assuredly pojdem ist okolo! He bol Hearer Omniscient
Those strive strive ich own dobre GOD bol DO ziaden need Z KTOKOLVEK
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota remit ich zhresit istota reward them generously for ich righteous robota
My enjoined human bol honor jeho rodicia. they try force ona set idols Mna nie obey them! Do Mna bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok potom ja informovat ona z everything ona robit
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota admit them s the righteous

Among the ludia there bol those say My verit v GOD mat rad skoro mat rad they suffer any hardship GOD they equate ludia persecution GOD's retribution! if blessings z tvoj Lord pojdem tvoj way they say My ona. je Bol GOD nie fully awareof ludia innermost thoughts
GOD will vela ISTOTA distinguish those verit He will vela ISTOTA expose hypocrites
Those disbelieved said do those verit ona nasledovat our way my bol zodpovedny tvoj zhresit. Nie true they nie bear any z ich zhresit. They bol liars
Skutocne they beriem ich own zhresit inak loads inak ludia zhresit they bol zodpovedny. vela istota they ziadat Dni Vzkriesenie ich false reklamovat
My sent Noah jeho ludia he zostat them 1000 rocnik menej 50. Subsequently they incurred zaplava ich transgressions
My saved him those sprevadzat him ark my set it lekcia all ludia
Abraham said do jeho zaludnit Ona kult GOD reverence Him! This je lepsie ona if ona len zauzlit

Co ona kult GOD bol powerless idols; ona invented laicky idols ona kult GOD nie possess any provisions ona! Therefore ona seek provisions len z GOD Ona kult Him alone bol appreciative z Him; Him bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok
Ona disbelieve generations ona i disbelieved Chodidlo function posol bol deliver (odkaz)
Have they nie seen ako GOD zasvatit creation potom! repeats it This bol easy GOD robit
Say Roam zem zalozit out origin zivot. For GOD will thus zasvatit creation Hereafter GOD bol Omnipotent
He condemns retribution whomever He wills lejak Jeho zlutovanie whomever He wills. Ultimately do Him ona je turned over
Ziaden z ona escape these facts zem heaven ona have ziaden GOD mat rad Lord Zvladnut
Those disbelieve GOD's revelations v schodza Him zufalstvo Moj zlutovanie! They incurred painful retribution
Iba response z jeho ludia bol ich saying Kill him burn him. GOD saved him z zapalit! This zadovazit lekcia zaludnit kto verit

He said Ona kult GOD powerless idols peer pressure iba zavarit some friendship ona v this worldly zivot! Potom Dni Vzkriesenie ona disown jeden iny curse 1 iny Tvoj destiny bol Hell wherein ona nie pomoc 1 iny
